title: Against the Grain
resume: Against the Grain is an American dramatic television series that aired on NBC from October to December 1993. There are 8 hour-long episodes, starring John Terry, Donna Bullock, Robyn Lively, Ben Affleck, and Vanessa Lee Evigan. The show was inspired by Buzz Bissinger's book Friday Night Lights: A Town, A Team, and a Dream.
